knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
library(dataRetrieval)
library(maps)
library(sf)
```


```{r}
# site type is streamflow
#param code for Discharge, mean daily (cfs)
st_nm <- whatNWISdata(stateCd="NM", siteType="ST", service="dv", parameterCd="00060") # new mexico
st_az <- whatNWISdata(stateCd="AZ", siteType="ST", service="dv", parameterCd="00060") # arizona

```

```{r}


map('state', regions='new mexico')
title(main="New Mexico Stream Sites")

plot(chuska$geometry)
points(x=st_nm$dec_long_va, 
       y=st_nm$dec_lat_va)

plot(chuska$geometry)
points(x=st_az$dec_long_va, 
       y=st_az$dec_lat_va)

```


```{r}
# read in the chuska shapefile
chuska <- read_sf("../Data/shapefiles/Chuska/", layer = "Chuska")



```


```{r}
map('state', regions='new mexico')
```



```{r}
chuska_st_data <- readNWISdata(bBox=c(-109.3536,35.8342,-108.663,36.6488),
                           parameterCd="00060")
```
